description.paragraph: "In 2081, as cybernetic implants become standardised, you play the role of a young inspector who is getting into trouble, both physically and legally because of an incident with her bionic heart during the pursuit of a fugitive...
However, this woman may hold the key to getting you out of trouble, if you manage to choose between revenge, duty and humanity..."
Humanium is a project realized within the framework of the tutored projects of the engineering school IMAC 2017.
This is a project in collaboration with the audiovisual association 803Z
